title: Looking for a team ranked gold + for sivir skin
body:
Hi im currently silver 4, looking for a gold + team to help me get the end of season rewards.
I am willing to gift a champ or skin in return for helping me to get the end of season rewards.

replies.body: I will never have this skin :'(
Don't ya just get the ward skin from the ranked 5's team not the Sivir skin? Thought it was only solo queue of the Skin?
